Auckland crash: truck driver dies in Epsom after hitting power pole https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-crash-truck-driver-dies-in-epsom-after-hitting-power-pole/ZYGOSRIPKBGVZFZO4VWRPUI2W4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-crash-truck-driver-dies-in-epsom-after-hitting-power-pole/ZYGOSRIPKBGVZFZO4VWRPUI2W4/ Ben LeahyEmergency teams freed the driver but they later died in hospital.Fri, 08 Dec 2023 20:06:56 +0000 A truck driver has died after crashing into a power pole in Epsom in Auckland on December 9. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Holiday park taken to Disputes Tribunal after couple’s waterfront spot given to someone else https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Couple-take-holiday-park-to-disputes-tribunal-after-waterfront-spot-given-to-someone-else/CN5CS4TWEZCRRGK5UYAJ7MJXWE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Couple-take-holiday-park-to-disputes-tribunal-after-waterfront-spot-given-to-someone-else/CN5CS4TWEZCRRGK5UYAJ7MJXWE/ Jeremy WilkinsonBooking blunder denies pair same prime spot they had used for 20 years. Fri, 08 Dec 2023 20:00:00 +0000 The couple arrived at their usual spot only to find another family had set up camp. Photo / NZME

Photo / David Haxton

Fatal car crash near Kaikoura: One dies at scene on SH1, six injured https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fatal-car-crash-near-kaikoura-one-dies-at-scene-on-sh1-six-injured/KDIP55YVBFDRHBN72GTUBL6RPE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fatal-car-crash-near-kaikoura-one-dies-at-scene-on-sh1-six-injured/KDIP55YVBFDRHBN72GTUBL6RPE/ Ben LeahyTwo people were airlifted to hospital and one died at the scene. Fri, 08 Dec 2023 18:45:54 +0000 The person died at the scene yesterday about 1.30pm on State Highway 1 at Kekerengu north of Kaikoura, but police are only now advising of their death. Photo / Google

Photo / Cameron Pitney
